TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Chain extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 证书的链生成引擎。

span.span: Represents a chain-building engine for certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象具有调用全局错误状态，应使用证书验证。The object has a global error status called that should be used for certificate validation. 管理证书验证的规则比较复杂，而且很容易过分验证逻辑简化通过忽略错误状态的一个或多个所涉及的元素。The rules governing certificate validation are complex, and it is easy to oversimplify the validation logic by ignoring the error status of one or more of the elements involved. 全局错误状态，将考虑链中每个元素的状态。The global error status takes into consideration the status of each element in the chain. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，则此类型实现接口。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向的应用[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]及早期版本、类未实现接口，并因此不具有`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#1)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. param.name: useMachineContext
param.span: 如果为 ，则使用计算机上下文；如果为 ，则使用当前用户上下文。

span.span: to use the machine context; to use the current user context.

summary.span: 通过指定一个值指示是否应使用计算机上下文，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying a value that indicates whether the machine context should be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不加载用户配置文件和程序需要使用计算机上下文时，可以使用此构造函数。This constructor can be used when the user profile is not loaded and the machine context needs to be used. 当`useMachineContext`参数设置为`true`，本地计算机上下文 （HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE 标志） 用于创建证书链。When the `useMachineContext` parameter is set to `true`, the local machine context (HCCE_LOCAL_MACHINE flag) is used to create the chain. 如果该参数设置为`false`，则使用当前用户上下文 （HCCE_CURRENT_USER 标志）。If the parameter is set to `false`, the current user context (HCCE_CURRENT_USER flag) is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

returns.span: 如果 X.509 证书有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the X.509 certificate is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，来自受信任的颁发者的有效的 X.509 证书是仅对在指定的方式使用有效对象。Note that a valid X.509 certificate from a trusted issuer is valid only for the use specified in the object. 满足这些链策略规则的证书也可能仍是使用安全/MIME (SMIME)、 验证码或安全套接字层 (SSL) 等功能的特定用途无效。Certificates that meet these chain policy rules might still be invalid for specific uses with such features as Security/MIME (SMIME), Authenticode, or Secure Sockets Layer (SSL). 如果需要进一步的处理来确定证书是否有效对于特定策略，派生的类从，并重写方法，以便它通过调用基类`Build`方法第一个，然后执行额外的处理。If further processing is required to determine whether the certificate is valid for a specific policy, derive a class from and override the method so that it calls the base class `Build` method first, and then does the additional processing. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChainElements As X509ChainElementCollection

span.span: Gets a collection of objects.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个对象是的表示形式的调用期间生成的链中的某个元素方法。Each object is a representation of an element in the chain that was built during a call to the method. 链元素组成对象，结构，以及额外信息字符串 （仅适用于 Windows XP 平台）。A chain element consists of an object, an structure, and an extra information string (available only on Windows XP platforms). ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#4)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ ChainPolicy { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509ChainPolicy ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置生成 X.509 证书链时要使用的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use when building an X.509 certificate chain.

value.span: 与此 X.509 链关联的 对象。

span.span: The object associated with this X.509 chain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性设置链策略。Use this property to set chain policy. 例如，你可以指定增强型密钥用法 (EKU) 为其链应验证，或者指定吊销检查。For example, you can specify the Enhanced Key Usage (EKU) for which the chain should be validated, or specify revocation checking. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开当前用户的个人证书存储区，允许你选择一个证书，然后将证书和证书链信息写入控制台。The following code example opens the current user's personal certificate store, allows you to select a certificate, then writes certificate and certificate chain information to the console. 输出取决于你选择的证书。The output depends on the certificate you select. [!code-cpp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CPP/x509chaintest.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/CS/x509chaintest.cs#3)] [!code-vb[x509chaintest#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/x509chaintest/vb/x509chaintest.vb#3)]

Public Shared Function Create () As X509Chain

summary.span: 查询 CryptoConfig 文件中定义的映射后，创建一个 对象，并将链映射到该映射。

span.span: Creates an object after querying for the mapping defined in the CryptoConfig file, and maps the chain to that mapping.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将创建 X.509 链。By default, this method will create an X.509 chain. 默认链生成引擎在 Machine.config 文件中被重写时，还可以使用此方法。You can also use this method when the default chain-building engine is overridden in the Machine.config file. 请注意，为了实现兼容，任何链引擎必须尝试遵循调用并返回的默认链引擎的语义。Note that for compatibility, any chain engine must attempt to honor the call and return semantics of the default chain engine.
